website_summaries.verdict: The Dyad 9 is a neutral running shoe like the Brooks Launch 6 that offers excellent arch support. Brooks recommends it for those who wear orthotics or those with wider feet. Versatility is a great asset of this shoe as it can work as a daily training partner and as an everyday wear for people who are up on their feet for long hours. It should be a solid option for those with flat or medium arches that also need good cushioning in their shoes.
pros: The Brooks Dyad 9 is very comfortable, according to most reviewers
It is lighter than the previous model
More than a few mentioned that the price is fair or average
Some runners noted that it is quite responsive
Traction is reliable, based on several comments
The cushioning is really good for those who work long hours or run daily, as remarked by more than a few
A handful loved its reliable arch support
Several runners have used it for endurance training and gym workouts
Some runners appreciated the adequate space in the interior to accommodate orthotics
A moderate number of runners gave a thumbs up to the shoe’s durability
More than a handful of runners appreciated the wide soles or footprint as it adds stability to their runs
cons: The 9th iteration of the Dyad is a bit stiffer than before
Despite being lighter than the earlier model, a handful still thought that it is a bit heavy
The toe box is narrower than the previous version, which greatly disappointed several loyal fans of this line
Ugly is often associated when it comes to the appearance of the 9th edition of the Dyad, based on the comments of some runners
The heel is shallower and does not provide security like the past model of this shoe, according to a few followers of the Dyad line

customer_reviews.title: The Dyad is Dead
customer_reviews.text: The Dyad 7 was an amazing shoe. The best I have ever worn. The Dyad 8 was almost as good. What the $@%# happened with the Dyad 9?? It is a hard, narrow, shoe with little arch support and NONE of the cushiness the previous Dyads had. Why did Brooks ruin their own shoe??
customer_reviews.author: Seth Crosby

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the 4E Dyad 9s are much narrower than the 4E Dyad 8s it replaced.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hurtley

customer_reviews.title: Just right firmness!
customer_reviews.text: With these Dyad 9 shoes I am able to easily run even if I am tired. And my knee pain is gone. The shoe has the perfect firmness and cushion needed to get you a good run without being too soft and too hard. Definitely worth the $65 I paid. The new model of this shoe Dyad 10 was fitting little better on the sides, but it costs double. I was told Dyad 9 and Dyad 10 has the same fit but only the design is different. That's not completely true. There are subtle upgrades. Nevertheless, this Dyad 9 serves my purpose for pavement and blacktop running easily. I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: VK

customer_reviews.title: Heel problems with DYAD's
customer_reviews.text: First time I wore these..my right heel developed a bad blister. Typically, it takes awhile to break the DYAD's in. Once the material around the heel becomes softer and more malleable, then the shoes fit well. This is my third set of DYAD's, but I understand that heel part has to be broken in before any longer runs(5 miles or more).
customer_reviews.author: Jim H

customer_reviews.title: Brooks Dyad 9 continues to fit and perform well
customer_reviews.text: I have run/walked in the Brooks Dyad for the past six years. It is perfect for people with a low arch. The shoe is well constructed and the sole wears well walking/running on concrete sidewalks. This particular color combination goes well with any color of attire.
customer_reviews.author: E. ONeill

customer_reviews.title: Best shoe I’ve ever had - 10.5 4e
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of Dyads and this is my favorite version so far. The color of shoes are a great dark gray and the blue is amazing see blue that can almost seem purple. The shoes are true to size and are comparable to the sizes of New Balance. But because of the light weight and durability, I won’t be going back to New Balance shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Alucard_Z

customer_reviews.title: two more features that make my legs and back happy.
customer_reviews.text: They fit me as expected. When it comes to buying running shoes, I buy one cm. more in length. I paid attention to the "size chart" and picked 8 M (D)=26 cm in length. I put them on and fit perfectly, which is the most important factor for me. Of course these shoes are neutral and cushioned, two more features that make my legs and back happy.
customer_reviews.author: CIPRIANO

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: The Dyad 10 I bought at a retailer was 130.00 Best pair I ever wore. These were 69.00. I took a chance and ordered these in the same size. Just as good. My plantar fasciitis is nearly gone alternately using the Dyad 9 and 10 Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: PETER Z.

customer_reviews.title: I wish I returned these
customer_reviews.text: Got 4E and still my feet get numb after cardio workout because the sneakers are restricting. Laces let out as far as I can and still be able to tie them. None of my other sneakers/shoes do this. I might as well throw them out. Too late to return now, but that's my fault. Always had great luck with Brooks in the past. Not at all this time.
customer_reviews.author: bill dyer

customer_reviews.title: Best walking shoe ever
customer_reviews.text: This walking shoe is quite possibly the most comfortable shoe I have ever worn. It fits my foot perfectly and provides a level of comfort for my feet, which are prone to pain at times. I recently wore them on a 10 day trip to New York City and Canada which involved a good amount of walking. These shoes performed beautifully, even through some good rain and puddles. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Dingodog

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe, been wearing Dyads for many years
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing Brooks' shoes for many years. Every runner tries different brands and styles until they find one they like. The Brooks Dyad is my favorite. They are comfortable, fit is good and I like the standard insert with neutral support. I have put them on right out of the box and run a half marathon with them, no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Richw

customer_reviews.title: My husband says he feet feel like he is jogging on clouds
customer_reviews.text: My husband says he feet feel like he is jogging on clouds. Part of the reason for this is he waited too long to replace his last pair of Brooks of this same style. He loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love Brooks shoes but these are my least favorite for daily wear
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are geared towards running more than daily wear. Great for running though. They seem like the sole is canted forward just slightly. And the arch support seems to be less than some of my other Brooks.
customer_reviews.author: TeamNolen

customer_reviews.title: These are good quality shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I like my Dyads. my only reservation is the Dyad 8 seems to have a softer sole. I may go back to the Ghost.
customer_reviews.author: Burns

customer_reviews.title: Brooks shoes are great
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of Brooks that my toe has worn a hole in the top of the shoe.I LOVE this shoe for looks and support but for $120 dollars the toe should last more than a month.
customer_reviews.author: DILLY DILLYAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The design has changed from the Dyad 8. Rubbed on my little toe
customer_reviews.author: charles o smith

customer_reviews.title: Dyad's Are Great
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased Dyad's for years, great workout shoe and very cushioned. I'm surprised they're not Brooks best sellers. When you buy Brooks you won't go back to any other shoe.
customer_reviews.author: TwoSox

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: always nice shoes. these are the best shoes for my husband's flat feet. Have purchased at least 10 pair over a few years and never, ever, fail to deliver.
customer_reviews.author: P. M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this shoe for my brother. Guess he’s happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Fits as expected
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected. Like the look but is a little loud when walking. Could be a little more flexible.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: did not like them. did not offer the support like they ...
customer_reviews.text: i wore these last night and walked a mile.... did not like them. did not offer the support like they said they would. ill go back to the beast
customer_reviews.author: J. Murray

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a glove
customer_reviews.text: The first shoe I have won that fits completely. No break-in time.
customer_reviews.author: DesAbo

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as my old pair, but pretty close.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking to replace my old pair of Brooks Dyad that had worn out. I have flat wide feet and use an insole insert. I replaced my old pair with the Dyad 9. The fit was as ordered, no issues. Not quite as comfortable as the old pair. We'll see in time how this pair works out.
customer_reviews.author: rfw1953

customer_reviews.title: Not a great fit for orthotics
customer_reviews.text: I read up on these shoes and they sounded like they would be a little roomy and for me they weren’t.. didn’t work well with my orthopedics either.. then something in the sole started coming apart and making a lot of noise.. would really like to return them..
customer_reviews.author: @hawaii_mitch

customer_reviews.title: STAY AWAY
customer_reviews.text: Absolute garbage. Hhorrible, HORRIBLE fit. 4E? Barely a M, let alone a 2E. Brooks keeps shrinking their sizing (why, I don't know, it's not like we're regressing as a society). At any rate, the absolute LAST pair of Brooks I ever own.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: An Excellent All-Around Shoe
customer_reviews.text: An excellent walking and general use shoe. I have been using the Brooks Dyad series for three years now and am very pleased with the shoes overall. I wish there were more color options for the 4E wearers.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell F

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe with added stability.
customer_reviews.text: The size is about a half size small. I normally wear a 9 but I need a 9.5 in these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: wcl

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I went from a Dyad 6 to a Dyad 9. I ordered size 11.5 D - same size as the 6's, which I was very happy with. The 9's were at least a size too small. I returned them and opted for Saucony Echelons. I like them much better. More cushion and better aesthetics.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: Well built shoes. Comfortable, but a bit I the tight side.
customer_reviews.author: Ocean

customer_reviews.title: Really sharp look.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking show. I have always ordered trail shoes from Brooks but these things are really nice for asphalt running shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Britt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit well and are very comfortable to take nightly walks in.
customer_reviews.author: laura huber

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes. Wide widths
customer_reviews.text: Bought to help with planter fashiatis. Like walking on a cloud. Been wearing them for a year and I'm pain free now
customer_reviews.author: bill

customer_reviews.title: Brooks on sale!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because 1/2 price brooks! Love them! Nurse on her wide feet all day long!!!
customer_reviews.author: B.W.

customer_reviews.title: Great Style and Comfort for Serious Walker
customer_reviews.text: These are my third pair of Brooks in this style. It fits me perfectly. I hope they don't change and screw up a good pair of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Caribeazul

customer_reviews.title: On time, perfect size and absolute comfort
customer_reviews.text: Ordered replacement for current Brooks Dyad shoes. On time delivery, perfect size and absolute comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size (9.5EEEE)
customer_reviews.text: Too tight!! Big difference from previous Dyad 6 which were made in China. These are made in Vietnam. Sending them back.
customer_reviews.author: Kareful Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Deep for Othotics
customer_reviews.text: If you wear a large corrective orthotic the volume of this shoe will be the one that will work for you. The shoe is neutral so that allows the orthotic to do the specific correction without shoe elements affecting it.
customer_reviews.author: James Lundy

customer_reviews.title: Not true 4E
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 4E and they fit like D width. Brooks RUINED the Dyad....only shoe I could wear.....now i'm lost
customer_reviews.author: Matt G

customer_reviews.title: Neutral shoe with high cushion
customer_reviews.text: Neutral shoe. Wide toe box with a wide bottom. I weigh 220 pounds and has good support for my size. This is my second pair. The last pair lasted for 579 miles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Running shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Had Brooks as a kid, still love wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Aldridge

customer_reviews.title: Too soon to tell
customer_reviews.text: Just started wearing them so it is too soon for me to give a thorough review.
customer_reviews.author: Hank

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: My husband where's the he's at work where he's on his feet all day
customer_reviews.author: joneill

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, lots of support, wish there were more color options though.
customer_reviews.author: crossbone

customer_reviews.title: Fit wide flat feet
customer_reviews.text: I have wide flat feet and tend to pronate. These fit and help counteract pronation
customer_reviews.author: amazon customer from montana

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic support - quality footwear
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic support - quality footwear - recommended by my foot doctor
customer_reviews.author: C. Dodkin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband really likes these, they are comfy and fit well
customer_reviews.author: gypsy

customer_reviews.title: HAPPY HUSBAND!
customer_reviews.text: This is my husbands third pair. He really likes them!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are not like previous models
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are not like previous models, they are small and unconformable. I wasted money on these. I always enjoyed brooks, hope they make corrections on the next models Dyad 10.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen B. Slashinski

customer_reviews.title: only shoe in use
customer_reviews.text: in use a 11 1/2 i think a 11 w would work bwtter getting old
customer_reviews.author: RON C.

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow
customer_reviews.text: When I first purchased the dyad 7 years ago they were the best shoes I've ever owned. The 8's were great but the 9's are a little too narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Nurse dad

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe but a little tight.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these before and they seem to fit better before.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Avaiable for those of us with wide feet
customer_reviews.text: The only sneaker available that I have found for a wide foot. I get 12 eeee and I can wear sneakers again !!
customer_reviews.author: W. Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and I walk about 1.5 miles each day.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Soos

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The look could use some improvement but the fit is great
customer_reviews.author: Coqui

customer_reviews.title: Wide foot natives listen up
customer_reviews.text: the dyad is great for wide feet natives, like mine in the 4E version--
customer_reviews.author: Jay Fatfoot

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I have always wore asics. This is my first and last brooks. They kill my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Morrell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: These are the only running shoes I will wear! Perfect for wide feet.
customer_reviews.author: Robert N.

customer_reviews.title: Best fit shoe for flat footed people such as myself
customer_reviews.text: Best fit shoe for flat footed people such as myself.Learned of this shoe through The Good Feet Store, Houston, TX.This shoe will correct your posture on on my 2nd pair
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Way too low of a cut around ankle. Much shallower than the Dyad 8s. Sending back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Need to look elsewhere if you have a wide foot.
customer_reviews.text: I have worn Asics size 11 2E for years and have been extremely satisfied with the them. A common complaint with the new styles is the size 2E are now narrower. Because of additional complains with Asics I ordered Brooks size 11 2E and found them to narrow. Exchanged them for size 4E and was surprised to find them also to narrow.
customer_reviews.author: PhoenixAsh

customer_reviews.title: Brooks shoes are winderful.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. My second pair this year. Good support and great for work and walking.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: disappointing redesign.
customer_reviews.text: This updates my earlier review. The last two versions of the Dyad were basically the same except for some appearance differences. This design is much worse. The fit is narrower. The insole is less cushioned and so is the outsole. I am a supinator and this design is no longer a truly neutral shoe. It has some anti pronation features. After wearing this shoe over several days it's very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Ramblin Man

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe by Brooks!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are a very comfy all around shoe for everyday use!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The most  impotant thing is the quality of the Brooks Shoe line.
customer_reviews.text: I liked that the Brooks Men's Dyad 9 shoe is very comfortable and great for walking or running.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Len Mort

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT SHOE
customer_reviews.text: The size was the best and the best part of is the sole very comfy
customer_reviews.author: Melisah Indakwa

customer_reviews.title: Brooks Dyad
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes! Bought them for my son and he said they are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Mary G. Atkins

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Left shoe suctions to the floor when walking on smooth surface.
customer_reviews.author: paul polastri

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Purchased shoes in February and they already are broken down.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Dabbelt

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are very comfortable and support me well
customer_reviews.text: Was hesitant to buy the 9s after wearing three pairs of the 8s. Had to take the plunge though, because there were no more Dyad 8s in my size. My feet are big, and I'm flat footed. These shoes are very comfortable and support me well. No more back problems due to poor shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: As Perfect as Expected
customer_reviews.text: This pair was a replacement for Dyad 6's I've had for three years and have worn completely out. They fit perfectly the first time I slipped my feet in them and zero breaking-in period. I was running in them the same day I received them. I've been using Brooks running shoes for about 15 years now and I recommend them highly.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Parker

customer_reviews.title: very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: When I walked, the toe area would fold, normal, my problem though was the excess material in the area cut into the top of my foot. Switched to the Brooks Addiction, very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: richard j. case

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: great fit and comfortable. I have an extra wide foot so have a hard time finding shoes that actually fit. These had been recommended to me even though I was scepitcal I ordered them to try. I'm glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: MCW

customer_reviews.title: I like them
customer_reviews.text: Fits well. Looks good. Functions as expected. Only time will tell whether or not the they will tear in the big toe area.
customer_reviews.author: Albert

customer_reviews.title: A sales lady told me they run small so I ordered a 1/2 size up and they feel great.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first experience with brooks shoes. A sales lady told me they run small so I ordered a 1/2 size up and they feel great.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: The show looks like Brooks cheapened this product to cut cost also
customer_reviews.text: I've had two other pair of Dyad's and these fit tighter than the other two pair. The show looks like Brooks cheapened this product to cut cost also. Bad move ! I'll pay a higher price for quality.
customer_reviews.author: Brian S.

customer_reviews.title: My daily use shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I first discovered these shoes at a high end shoe shop, where they analyze your feet, stance, and gait. They also ask about how you'll be using the shoes. I said it would be for every day wear plus jogging. This was a year ago. They recommended (and I bought) the Dyad 8. The shoe is good for about a year of regular use so when I was ready for a replacement I bought the Dyad 9 at Amazon. I love this shoe. Comfortable, supportive, good traction.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Price

customer_reviews.title: My son really likes these. He has a VERY ...
customer_reviews.text: My son really likes these. He has a VERY wide foot and these fit well. I did get a half a size bigger based on all the reviews and that worked out perfect
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Don't think I'll change shoe brands again.
customer_reviews.text: After wearing these a day or two, my feet don't hurt. Had changed to a New Balance and these are just super comfortable for my wide, flat foot.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Holland

customer_reviews.title: They're ok
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected. Thread coming apart after 2nd time wearing. Maybe total of 6 hours. Need to see if they'll replace them
customer_reviews.author: Darrell Penny

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best running shoe that I've found to use with my Orthotic Inserts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: couple of issues but still like them.
customer_reviews.text: Really like my Dyad 8 but the 9 feels a little narrow. Also, this was the only color available at the time and they are really ugly. I changed the laces to white and it helped. Even with these 2 issues I like them and gave them a 4 star.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These shoes works great!!
customer_reviews.text: I walk 12 to 16 miles a day. These shoes works great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Steven R. Francis
